### GrpcWeb

 
GrpcWeb support is enabled be default. Use this extension to disable it.

```yaml
"disable": bool

```

| Field | Type | Description | Default |
| ----- | ---- | ----------- |----------- | 
| `disable` | `bool` | Disable grpc web supoort. |  |
